00003 namespace bolt;
00004 
00005 abstract class plugin {
00006 
00007     // plugins
00008     private $_plugin = array();
00009     private $_instance = array();
00010     private $_fallback = array();
00011     
00012     // let's construct
00013     public function __construct($fallback=array()) {
00014         $this->setFallbacks($fallback);        
00015     }
00016     
00017     // plugin
00018     public function getPlugins() {
00019         return $this->_plugin;
00020     }
00021     
00022     // fallback
00023     public function setFallbacks($classes) {
00024         if (is_string($classes)) {
00025             $classes = array($classes);
00026         }
00027         return $this->_fallback = array_merge($this->_fallback, $classes);
00028     }   
00029     
00030     // get fallcacks
00031     public function getFallbacks() {
00032         return $this->_fallback;
00033     }
00034         
00035     // call something
00036     public function __call($name, $args) {
00037         return $this->call($name, $args);
00038     }
00039 
00040     ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00041     /// @brief call one of our plugins
00042     ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00043     public function call($name, $args=array()) {
00044     
00045         // func
00046         $method = false;    
00047     
00048         // see if this needs to be routed 
00049         // to another 
00050         if (stripos($name, '.') !== false) {
00051         
00052             // split into parts
00053             $parts = explode('.', $name);
00054             
00055             // first part
00056             $name = array_shift($parts);
00057             
00058             // set the rest of parts as $args
00059             if (array_key_exists($name, $this->_plugin)) {
00060                 return call_user_func(array($this->_plugin[$name], 'call'), array_merge(array(implode('.', $parts)), $args));
00061             }
00062             else {
00063                 return false;
00064             }
00065             
00066         }
00067         
00068         // do we not have a plugin for this
00069         if (!array_key_exists($name, $this->_plugin)) {
00070             
00071             // loop through our fallbacks
00072             foreach ($this->_fallback as $class) {
00073                 if (method_exists($class, $name)) {
00074                     return call_user_func_array(array($class, $name), $args);
00075                 }                
00076             }
00077         
00078             // we go nothing
00079             return false;
00080 
00081         }
00082         
00083         // get it 
00084         $plug = $this->_plugin[$name];        
00085         
00086         // figure out if there's a function to direct to
00087         if (strpos($plug, '::')!== false) {
00088         
00089             // get the orig plugin name
00090             list($name, $method) = explode('::', $plug);                      
00091             
00092             // reset plug
00093             $plug = $this->_plugin[$name];
00094             
00095         }            
00096         
00097         // is plug callable
00098         if (is_callable($plug)) {
00099             return call_user_func_array($plug, $args);
00100         }    
00101         
00102         // ask the class what it is
00103         if ($plug::$TYPE == 'factory') {
00104             return call_user_func_array(array($plug, "factory"), $args);
00105         }
00106         
00107         // singleton 
00108         else if ($plug::$TYPE == 'singleton') {        
00109                                     
00110             // if we don't have an instance
00111             if (!array_key_exists($name, $this->_instance)) {  
00112                 $this->_instance[$name] = new $plug();
00113             }        
00114             
00115             // instance
00116             $i = $this->_instance[$name];     
00117                        
00118             // is it a string
00119             if ($method) {
00120                 return call_user_func_array(array($i, $method), $args);
00121             }
00122             else if (isset($args[0]) AND is_string($args[0]) AND method_exists($i, $args[0]) ){ 
00123                 return call_user_func_array(array($i, array_shift($args)), $args);
00124             }            
00125             else if (method_exists($i, "_default")) {            
00126                 return call_user_func_array(array($i, "_default"), $args);
00127             }
00128             else {
00129                 return $i;
00130             }
00131             
00132                         
00133         }
00134         
00135     }
00136 
00137     ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00138     /// @brief plugin to bolt
00139     ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00140     public function plug($name, $class=false) {
00141         
00142         // is it an array
00143         if (is_array($name)) {
00144             foreach ($name as $n => $c) {
00145                 $this->_plugin[$n] = $c;
00146             }
00147         }
00148         
00149         // just one
00150         else {    
00151             $this->_plugin[$name] = $class;
00152         }
00153         
00154         // good
00155         return true;
00156         
00157     }
00158 
00159 
00160 }
